summary: Fixed gift card seeding to use Arr::random for reliable amount selection and updated booking reminder command to use a datetime window with COALESCE of booking_date_time or booking_date/booking_time. Kluster auto-review could not run (tool reported repo not detected).
current_status: Seeder and reminder command corrected; ready to rerun reminders and seeders. Pending successful kluster review when tool access to git is available.
